marginalia.anchor_text: p[er]fecta p[ro] p[ar]ib[us] nu[m]er[is] [et] abu[n]da[n]tia p[ro] i[m]parib[us]

position.marginalia_text: perfectu[m] p[ro] pari et abu[n]da[n]s p[ro] impari

marginalia.translation: Perfect for even numbers and abundant for odd numbers.

marginalia.anchor_text: Hic ph[ilosophu]s volens ostendere q[ua]lit[er] accipie[n]da sunt p[ri]ncipia p[ro]pria cuiuslibet discipline iuxta artem inue[n]tionis medij ab eo tradita[m] dicit

position.marginalia_text: na[m] illa ars ab aristotele tradita vniversalissima est.

marginalia.translation: For this art that has come down to us from Aristotle is the most universal.

underline.text: fiat no[n] erit silogism[us] oste[n]siu[us]. aut no[n] erit ad min[us] ad p[ro]positu[m]. aut erit petitio ei[us] q[uo]d i[n] p[ri]ncipio e[st] vt de petit[i]o[n]e p[ri]ncipij p[ro]seq[ui]t[ur]
Sumit na[m]q[uam] arest.sp[er] i[n] seque[n]tib[us] p[er]fecta p[ro] p[ar]ib[us] nu[m]er[is] [et] abu[n]da[n]tia p[ro] i[m]parib[us]. c[aus]as p[ro]pt[er] q[ui]d i[n] seque[n]tib[us] o[ste]ndem[us]
accipie[n]da sunt p[ri]ncipia p[ro]pria cuiuslibet discipline iuxta artem inue[n]tionis medij ab eo
